text: Egh ian tav poroghamiba uari bakɨa uari ko akuir arazim damuan markɨ. Egh tav Iso fomɨra amizir arazimɨn mɨn, God akɨrim ragh a gasaraghan markɨ. A uan afeziam Aisakɨn otarir ivariamra, egh bizir aghuir avɨriba iniam fɨrɨn, egha dagher otevir vamɨra bagha pura uan bizir aghuiba bar da isa uan dozimɨn agharim gatɨ.
